creator: BrightHR
descriptionHtml:
Our innovative and user friendly mobile solution lets colleagues communicate their attendance in an instant. Update sickness, holidays and personal time with a tap of your finger.
It will notify your line manager, deliver instant feedback, and even give you access to important documents.
Let us take the hassle out of your HR.
App features:
+ Secure, anytime, anywhere access available 24/7
+ Your HR info, planned time off and remaining allowance in your pocket
+ Get notified the moment something changes that matters to you
+ Shifts and rotas for you and your colleagues on the go
+ Scan and upload a fit note straight from your bed
+ Your employees' designated emergency contact details with you at all times
+ Features to reduce paperwork and simplify holiday requests
+ And lots, lots more!
descriptionShort: Manage staff holidays, record sickness & view rotas all with BrightHR

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are pleased to announce that we have made it even easier to view Furlough absences.
- You can now view the details of a recorded absence from your phone.

This is an incremental improvement as we try hard to support your needs in this difficult time.

Please continue with your invaluable support.

With Love
#BrightHR Team

Let us take the hassle out of your HR.
App features:
+ Secure, anytime, anywhere access available 24/7
+ Your HR info, planned time off and remaining allowance in your pocket
+ Get notified the moment something changes that matters to you
+ Shifts and rotas for you and your colleagues on the go
+ Scan and upload a fit note straight from your bed
+ Your employees' designated emergency contact details with you at all times
+ Features to reduce paperwork and simplify holiday requests
+ And lots, lots more!
descriptionShort: Manage staff holidays, record sickness & view rotas all with BrightHR

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have changed who can see salary information as part of this update.
Managers will not be able to see their subordinates' salary unless they have payroll permissions.
Thank you for your constant feedback, please continue with your invaluable support.

descriptionHtml:
Our innovative and user friendly mobile solution lets colleagues communicate their attendance in an instant. Update sickness, holidays and personal time with a tap of your finger.
It will notify your line manager, deliver instant feedback, and even give you access to important documents.
Let us take the hassle out of your HR.
App features:
+ Secure, anytime, anywhere access available 24/7
+ Your HR info, planned time off and remaining allowance in your pocket
+ Get notified the moment something changes that matters to you
+ Shifts and rotas for you and your colleagues on the go
+ Scan and upload a fit note straight from your bed
+ Your employees' designated emergency contact details with you at all times
+ Features to reduce paperwork and simplify holiday requests
+ And lots, lots more!
descriptionShort: Manage staff holidays, record sickness & view rotas all with BrightHR

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
Thank you for your feedback.
Please continue with your invaluable support.
With Love
#BrightHR Team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release removes support for Android devices running Android 5 "Lollipop".
Raising the minimum version to Android 6 "Marshmallow" means we can better focus on delivering the best mobile experience for users of the BrightHR platform.

If you are personally unable to upgrade, you can always make use of our web app instead at app.brighthr.com.

creator: BrightHR
descriptionHtml:
Our innovative and user friendly mobile solution lets colleagues communicate their attendance in an instant. Update sickness, vacations and personal time with a tap of your finger.
It will notify your line manager, deliver instant feedback, and even give you access to important documents.
Let us take the hassle out of your HR.
App features:
+ Secure, anytime, anywhere access available 24/7
+ Your HR info, planned time off and remaining allowance in your pocket
+ Get notified the moment something changes that matters to you
+ Shifts and rotas for you and your colleagues on the go
+ Scan and upload a fit note straight from your bed
+ Your employees' designated emergency contact details with you at all times
+ Features to reduce paperwork and simplify vacation requests
+ And lots, lots more!
descriptionShort: Manage staff vacations, record sickness all with BrightHR

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
Thank you for your feedback.
Please continue with your invaluable support.
With Love
